gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends Object
    Holds all the information associated with an entity declaration in the DTD. Class includes constants to indicate whether an entity is a parameter or a general entity.
    Author:
    Demian Hess

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int GENERAL_ENTITY
      An entity with this "type" is a general entity
      static int PARAMETER_ENTITY
      An entity with this "type" is a parameter entity

      • setIncluded

        public void setIncluded(boolean i)
        Set the included flag. For external parameter entities only, this will be called with an argument of 'true' when we actually see it (in the startEntity handler).

      • getIncluded

        public boolean getIncluded()
        Get the value of the included flag. This should only be considered to be valid for external parameter entities.
